overview: Collection of three short films from Nova. "TubTricks" — Join superstar Lee Martin on his first trip to the baths as he discovers hot guys everywhere and ends up in the orgy room where there are no holds barred. "Backpackin'"— A mountaineer encounters a backpacker showering in a waterfall, resulting in big-dicked sex as fresh and invigorating as the mountain air. "A Very Hot Day" — Two roommates bring home a pair of very sexy tricks, resulting in a mini orgy that sends hot juices flying.
title: TubTricks
